Uses of Class
java.nio.channels.SelectableChannel

Packages that use SelectableChannel 
Package Description
com.sun.nio.sctp
A Java API for Stream Control Transport Protocol.
java.nio.channels
Defines channels, which represent connections to entities that are capable of performing I/O operations, such as files and sockets; defines selectors, for multiplexed, non-blocking I/O operations.
java.nio.channels.spi
Service-provider classes for the java.nio.channels package.
jdk.nio
Defines JDK-specific channel APIs.

  • Uses of SelectableChannel in com.sun.nio.sctp

    Subclasses of SelectableChannel in com.sun.nio.sctp 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  SctpChannel
    A selectable channel for message-oriented connected SCTP sockets.
    class  SctpMultiChannel
    A selectable channel for message-oriented SCTP sockets.
    class  SctpServerChannel
    A selectable channel for message-oriented listening SCTP sockets.

  • Uses of SelectableChannel in java.nio.channels

    Subclasses of SelectableChannel in java.nio.channels 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  DatagramChannel
    A selectable channel for datagram-oriented sockets.
    static class  Pipe.SinkChannel
    A channel representing the writable end of a Pipe.
    static class  Pipe.SourceChannel
    A channel representing the readable end of a Pipe.
    class  ServerSocketChannel
    A selectable channel for stream-oriented listening sockets.
    class  SocketChannel
    A selectable channel for stream-oriented connecting sockets.
    Methods in java.nio.channels that return SelectableChannel 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    abstract SelectableChannel SelectionKey.channel()
    Returns the channel for which this key was created.
    abstract SelectableChannel SelectableChannel.configureBlocking​(boolean block)
    Adjusts this channel's blocking mode.

  • Uses of SelectableChannel in jdk.nio

    Methods in jdk.nio that return SelectableChannel 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static SelectableChannel Channels.readWriteSelectableChannel​(FileDescriptor fd, Channels.SelectableChannelCloser closer)
    Creates a selectable channel to a file descriptor that supports an operation-set of OP_READ and OP_WRITE.
    Methods in jdk.nio with parameters of type SelectableChannel 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void Channels.SelectableChannelCloser.implCloseChannel​(SelectableChannel sc)
    Closes a selectable channel.
    void Channels.SelectableChannelCloser.implReleaseChannel​(SelectableChannel sc)
    Release the file descriptor and any resources for a selectable channel that closed while registered with one or more Selectors.
